DataElement.preferredName: PACE 17 Rate Overall Experience with Communication Related to Cancer Care Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how they would rate their overall experiences with communication related to their cancer care, from the time there was a suspicion that they might have cancer, through the present, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Assessment of Cancer Communication Experiences Rate Overall Experience with Communication Related to Cancer Care Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A survey tool designed to assess a patient?s perspective on the communication they had over the course of their cancer care, with a focus on the patient?s perception of whether specific communication goals had been achieved._A question about how an individual would rate their experiences with communication related to their cancer care overall, from the time there was a suspicion that they might have cancer, through the present._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Patient Assessment of Cancer Communication Experiences
